review: We had been streaming Netflix through an old Wii and started looking at options. Received an email from Amazon offering the Fire TV on sale. GREAT device - super easy to set up and so much easier and less cumbersome to use than streaming through the Wii. Love the voice command feature - works great. Also love the 30 day free trial of Prime and will keep that going since there are some series on Amazon that aren't on Netflix - Justified being one. My only hesitation is they currently do not offer HBO GO but supposedly will by the end of the year.
author: Brenda in TX
